classmethod deleteByUrl(url_id, custom={})¶

Delete By URL

Deletes all views associated with a url ID

Parameters

  • url_id (str|str[]) – The UUID of the url

  • custom (dict) – Custom Host and DB info ‘host’ the name of the host to get/set data on ‘append’ optional postfix for dynamic DBs

Returns

None
